items.content_html: AvalynxLoader is a lightweight JavaScript library designed to provide a loading overlay for DOM elements. Based on Bootstrap >=5.3 without any framework dependencies.

items.content_html: AvalynxSelect is a lightweight, customizable select dropdown component for web applications. It is designed to be used with Bootstrap version 5.3 or higher and does not require any framework dependencies.
items.title: avalynx/avalynx-select: AvalynxSelect is a lightweight, customizable select dropdown component for web applications. It is designed to be used with Bootstrap version 5.3 or higher and does not require any framework dependencies.

items.content_html: AvalynxDatatable is a simple, lightweight, and customizable datatable for the web. Based on Bootstrap >=5.3 without any framework dependencies.
items.title: avalynx/avalynx-datatable: AvalynxDatatable is a simple, lightweight, and customizable datatable for the web. Based on Bootstrap >=5.3 without any framework dependencies.

items.content_html: get-user-os is a lightweight, easy-to-use JavaScript library that provides a simple API to detect the operating system of a user. It's built with TypeScript and works seamlessly across different browsers

items.content_html: Movie API is designed to be a lightweight and flexible interface for managing a movie database. It's built to support all the basic CRUD operations on movie records, making it an excellent tool for developers looking to integrate movie data into their projects.
items.title: okircan97/Moviez-backend: Movie API is designed to be a lightweight and flexible interface for managing a movie database. It's built to support all the basic CRUD operations on movie records, making it an excellent tool for developers looking to integrate movie data into their projects.
